article.title: 10 Things To Do In Colombo At Night
article.lead_paragraph: Colombo has an exciting nightlife including an enthusiastic crowd, themed pubs, enchanting cafes, delectable cuisines, foot-tapping live music, great bands and roulette rolling at the casinos. Some of them are extremely pocket-friendly and nightlife in the city of Colombo is regarded as the best in Sri Lanka. Moreover, the good news for visitors is that the Sri Lankan government has declared gambling legal in the country so the city's casinos are the true highlight in the nightlife of Colombo. Depending on your budget and preference, here are Colombo's top 10 things to do at night.
article.proposal:
1. Bally's Casino
2. Rhythm and Blues Nightclub
3. Loft Lounge Bar
4. Bellagio Casino
5.  ZAZA Bar
6. ON14 Rooftop Bar
7. Sky Lounge
8.  Mollyâ€™s Pub
article.meta_description: Colombo has an exciting nightlife including an enthusiastic crowd, themed pubs, enchanting cafes, delectable cuisines, foot-tapping live music, great bands and roulette rolling at the casinos.

snippets.title: 1. Bally's Casino
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BuXKF4Qg5gK/

One of the best places to be for enjoying your time in the city, Bally's Casino is a hot favorite in Colombo's nightlife. The casino is known for its warm hospitality, trust, respect and great warmth. It has a big area for gaming which is always crowded with tourists as well as local residents. You can begin your stakes with just a few hundred and can take them up to several lacs. The casino treats the players with complimentary drinks and delicious snacks. The casino operates round the clock so you can visit at a convenient time for you.


> #### Bally's Casino
>
> **Address**:  34 D R Wijewardena Mawatha, Colombo 00100, Sri Lanka
>
> **Website**: [Bally's Casino](https://www.ballyscolombo.com/)

snippets.title: 2. Rhythm and Blues Nightclub
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/rhythmandbluescolombo/photos/rpp.280539565332904/1359731767413673/?type=3&theater
https://www.facebook.com/rhythmandbluescolombo/photos/rpp.280539565332904/1359731810747002/?type=3&theater

This is one of the finest nightclubs of Colombo. In fact, Rhythm and Blues is a welcoming and charming party venue. It features an inviting interior and its menu is known to include lip-smacking finger foods and the best drinks. If you are with a group of your friends then it is a superb place to party in the capital of Sri Lanka. 


> #### Rhythm and Blues Nightclub 
>
> **Address**:  19/1, Daisy Villa Avenue, Colombo, Sri Lanka
>
> **Facebook**: [Rhythm and Blues Nightclub](https://www.facebook.com/rhythmandbluescolombo/)

snippets.title: 3. Loft Lounge Bar
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/3lwBXlL_IZ/

An excellent place to relax and rejuvenate and features arty and quirky interiors. Loft Lounge Bar is a charming and trendy hangout bar that  showcases recycled scraps such as sack cushions, tractor pieces used on barstools and ceiling sheets. The bar's top sellers include whipped cocktails and classic drinks. It is also known for its interesting menu and friendly staff, which makes clubbing an amazing experience in Colombia. It is open from 8 pm to 3 am every day.


> #### Loft Lounge Bar 
>
> **Address**:  Colombo Courtyard, Alfred House Ave, Colombo 00300, Sri Lanka
>
> **Facebook**: [Loft Lounge Bar](https://www.facebook.com/Loftloungebar/)

snippets.title: 4. Bellagio Casino
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/81F99qMu8b/

This casino is strategically situated in the city of Colombo. Bellagio Casino has tables with low stake games right near the entrance while the high rollers are placed in the center of the gaming area. Once you start bidding at the casino frequently you can enjoy the food and drinks absolutely free of cost. You will find a cheerful and lively atmosphere with players seen celebrating their victory. Enjoy an eventful evening in this exciting gambling world of Black Jack, Roulette, and Three Card Jack. The casino operates round the clock every day.


> ####  Bellagio Casino 
>
> **Address**:  430 R A De Mel Mawatha, Colombo, Sri Lanka
>
> **Website**: [Bellagio Casino](http://bellagiocolombo.com/)

snippets.title: 5. Zaza Bar
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/chP0-_IDEw/?tagged=casacolombohotel

The bar will give you an illusion of being outside as you enjoy its comfortable indoors. Zaza Bar is surrounded by glass ceilings and walls and features an abstract and contemporary environment. The string of neon lights that are added to its interior enhances the bar's ambiance by lending appealing hues. Indulge yourself either with gastronomical delights or extensive cocktails as you sway to the sleuthing music in the bar. It's open from 8 am in the morning to 12 am at night, daily


> ####  Zaza Bar 
>
> **Address**:  Casa Colombo, 231, Galle Rd, Colombo 00400, Sri Lanka
>
> **Website**: [Zaza Bar](http://www.casacolombo.com/zazabar.htm)

snippets.title: 6. ON14 Rooftop Bar
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BUMtMgsFYxE/?tagged=on14rooftopbarandlounge

This rooftop bar is one of the major highlights of Colombo's nightlife. Many patrons will tell you that you can get the best views of Colombo from ON14. The bar reflects glamor, class, and sophistication. There is a rooftop swimming pool, which further adds fun and style to the place,  Enjoy some out-of-this-world beverages, decor, clientele, and food here. A key highlight of the place is its quirky chandelier that keeps changing its color. You can also enjoy a mesmerizing view of the mighty Indian Ocean. This is an ideal bar where you can plan a memorable evening with your special date.

 
> #### ON14 Rooftop Bar
>
> **Address**:   No: 36-38, Clifford Place, 14th Floor - OZO, Colombo 00400, Sri Lanka
>
> **Website**: [ON14 Rooftop Bar](https://www.facebook.com/on14rooftopbarlounge/)

snippets.title: 7. Sky Lounge
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BVxWBHNBiai/?taken-by=skyloungecafe

This is one of the coolest inclusions to the happening nightlife of Colombo. Sky Lounge is regarded as a hippy nightclub in Colombo that features awesome parties, beverages and creative food items on its menu. It is indeed a phenomenal site with their signature-styled molecular cocktails, premium champagnes and high-quality cigars. The place also offers spectacular views of the old parliament, Galle Face, and the famous Colombo Port. Sky Lounge is open from 5.30 pm in the evening to around 3 am in the morning.


> ####  Sky Lounge
>
> **Address**:  10th Floor, No. 48, Janadhipathi Mawatha, Colombo 00100, Sri Lanka
>
> **Website**: [Sky Lounge](https://www.thekingsburyhotel.com/colombo-restaurants/sky-lounge/)

snippets.title: 8. Mollyâ€™s Pub
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BVx3--KABPv/?taken-by=mollyspubandcarryout

Molly's Pub is an Irish Bar owned by a lady called Annette who ensures that the patrons can unwind themselves in a lively and relaxed space every time they visit. The pub is hidden in Nawam Mawatha and the owner always extends a warm welcome to her patrons. The place is famous for its lively environment, Irish delicacies, live performances and cozy ambiance. You can visit the pub in between 10 am to 12 am every day.

> ####  Mollyâ€™s Pub
>
> **Address**:  46/38, Nawam Mawatha, Slave Island, Colombo, Sri Lanka 
>

snippets.title: 9. Watch sunset at Mount Lavinia
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BuIau1vn2vu/

If you want to marvel at the beauty of the sunset while in Colombo, Mount Lavinia is one of the ideal places to do so. There are some really good hotels in the neighborhood with all the necessary facilities. So you can stay back for the night at one of them after enjoying the beauty of the sunset.




> #### Watch sunset at Mount Lavinia 
>
> **Address**:  45 Initium Rd, Dehiwala, Mount Lavinia, Sri Lanka

snippets.title: 10. Night tour of the city
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/lVAWDIlP6Y/?taken-by=colombonightout

Your trip to the city of Colombo will remain incomplete if you do not enjoy a night tour of the place. Some of the major highlights of the city's night tour include Independence Memorial, shopping at Laksala, which is a handicrafts emporium owned by the state, a boat ride on Lake Diyawanna, and a visit to the Arcade Independence Square, among many other interesting sites.


> #### Night tour of the city
>
> **Address**:  Colombo, Sri Lanka
>
> **Website**: [Night tour of the city](http://www.colombocitytours.com/colomboatnight.php)

lead_paragraph_embed.value: Colombo has an exciting nightlife including an enthusiastic crowd, themed pubs, enchanting cafes, delectable cuisines, foot-tapping live music, great bands and roulette rolling at the casinos. Some of them are extremely pocket-friendly and nightlife in the city of Colombo is regarded as the best in Sri Lanka. Moreover, the good news for visitors is that the Sri Lankan government has declared gambling legal in the country so the city's casinos are the true highlight in the nightlife of Colombo. Depending on your budget and preference, here are Colombo's top 10 things to do at night.

article.guidelines:
##### 1. For listings WITH partner links (getyourguide / viator / klook): 

Category: Things to do 

Tags: things to do

Paragraph Headings: 

- Create a creative and catchy heading for the activity. 

- Example: "North-end Boston secret food tour" should be changed to something like "Indulge in some delicious local fare".

Photos: Not required*

Snippets: Not required*

*Ensure the tour link is copy/pasted in the partner link field for each section


##### 2. For listings WITHOUT partner links:

Category: Things to do 

Tags: things to do

Paragraph Headings: 

- Create a creative and catchy heading for the activity. 

- Example: "North-end Boston secret food tour" should be changed to something like "Indulge in some delicious local fare".

Photos: 
- Include relevant royalty-free / social media photos

- Upload 1 relevant royalty-free image (non-social media image) in the conclusion paragraph to use as the article's main image (ONLY if all listings have social media images)

- Refer to this tutorial guide: http://bit.ly/imagetutorialguide

Snippets: 

- Insert the "Things to do / Tours / Attractions" snippet manually at the end of each listing's paragraph and edit the information accordingly.

navigator.introduction:
Pala Sen is an avid follower of travel and health updates, current affairs and entertainment news from all across the world and writing is a passion for her.
She had been previously associated with the corporate world for several years and holds a degree in MBA and a post graduate software diploma called GNIIT from NIIT. Pala is also a Microsoft Certified Professional and loves visiting new places, reading and socialising in her spare time.
